title: How to Make Raisin Cookies

steps.headline: Place raisins water.
steps.description: Cook until almost all the water has evaporated.

steps.headline: Add vanilla and mix into shortening mixture.
Add eggs and mix into shortening mixture.
Add flour, baking soda and salt.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or silicone baking sheet.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.
Amount varies on size of cookie.

text: Place raisins water. Cook until almost all the water has evaporated. Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Cream sugar and shortening.  Add vanilla and mix into shortening mixture.  Add eggs and mix into shortening mixture.  Stir in raisins.  Add flour, baking soda and salt.  Mix well.  Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or silicone baking sheet.  Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.  Cool on wire baking racks.  Amount varies on size of cookie.
tyn_model: parchment paper or silicone baking sheet
